features: DIGITAL ALARM CLOCK MIRROR SURFACE: SZELAM alarm clock combines with makeup mirror, alarm clock and time display function. The HD mirror display can map your beauty, you can also use it as a mirror for your beauty and makeup while watching the time. The specially designed mirror surface is not easy to be stained with ash which can be cleaned with a single rub to restore the original clean appearance. You can put it upright, put it flat or hang it on the wall, just choose the way you like it

A QUIET SLEEPING ENVIRONMENT&LUMINOUS FUNCTION: Unlike Mechanical alarm clock that keeps ticking, affecting the quality of your sleep. We SZELAM clock is quiet, allowing you to get rid of the noise of the night and sleep peacefully. The user-friendly designed luminous function allows you to see the time clearly at night and does not need to turn on the lights.When it is 12-hour system, it will not display AM before 12 noon but will display PM after 1 PM

3-LEVEL BRIGHTNESS SETTINGS: Other clock have only one level of brightness, which will be particularly dazzling when the lights are turned off at night, long-term past will cause damage to your eyes. We SZELAM alarm clock adopts highly sensitive photosensitive sensor, which can automatically adjust the display brightness according to the brightness of the environment, or manually set the Bright-Medium-Dim 3-level brightness, better for your eyes and more environmentally friendly

MEMORY FUNCTION&Dual USB PORTS：When the external power supply is powered off, the hold time and various settings are unchanged. The time after the external power supply is cut off is not displayed, so as to avoid repeating the settings next time. Dual USB ports allow you to charge two devices at the same time, say goodbye to the embarrassing situation of lack of electricity while playing phone in the bed

5-60 MINUTES' SNOOZE FOR HEAVY SLEEPERS : The big snooze button helps you easily turn off the buzzer but don’t need to open your eyes and enjoy five minutes of sleep. The clock will alarm every 5 min and the default Snooze time is 2 min until you turn off the snooze mode by pressing any other buttons. You can also set snooze time by yourself. Perfect for heavy sleepers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SZELAM LED and Mirror Digital Alarm Clock

Alarm Clock Can remind you and your family at different times in the morning, noon and evening. Snooze Mode After the first alarm reminder, you can get 5-60 minutes of lazy bed time, and the alarm clock will remind you again. 12/24h Mode You can set 12H/24H two different display modes according to your reading habits. Package Included 1 X Alarm Clock;1 X Power Adapter;1 X USB Charging Cable;1 X CR2016 Battery;1 X Instruction Manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the bedroom
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a digital clock that could be dimmed so it didn't light up the bedroom at night. This one also offers different colors. The red is easily readable in the dark even without my glasses. The only minus is that when set on the dimmest setting it's not really visible in the daytime. There is a feature that brightens or dims automatically, but it brightens too early in the morning for us. A great feature if you have to wake up early! Otherwise I love it! I also like that the clock is small, so it doesn't take up much space on my nightstand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet little clock!
reviews.reviewText: Cute little clock that has some great features!This clock is LED with a mirror surface.It has 2 USB ports to charge my devices.3 levels of brightness with auto dimming. I really like that at night.It's an alarm clock with snooze mode. 12/24 hour mode.It comes with well written instructions.Like I said a sweet little clock with lots of great features for not a lot of money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clear display, bright, "mirror" face, simple controls, light-construction.
reviews.reviewText: I like the display - clear and bright. Controls are simple and the alarm works well. No customizing here - just the basics but it works well. Feels lightly constructed and the base is somewhat fragile - you can snap off the feet pretty easily. I do like this clock enough to have it on my office desk and it looks sharp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little clock is great! Looks nice and works great! Love that you can charge your phone with it. Love the dimming feature

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this clock
reviews.reviewText: Sleek and stylish but simple. Goes with my decor- very helpful. If you do any work from home as you don’t have to look at the little time on your computer monitor and you can also set this as an alarm if needed. Can also set in military time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not built to last
reviews.reviewText: The display is nice but extremely bright even on lowest dim setting at night and difficult to see during the day due to the mirror finish. Also difficult to set up. Alarm is very loud and easy to turn on by accident! Has just recently stopped working even though it is plugged in and the time is at least a few mins behind no matter how many times I’ve reset it. It was working ok until the last few weeks, the time visibility fluctuates between the bright setting and off on its own now, and I’ve made sure there wasn’t a kink in the power cord and it even has a battery backup installed. I guess I got a good amount of use from it but I will not be buying this one again. Next I will be sure to get one with app control or a remote to have an easier time controlling it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised, all parts received
reviews.reviewText: The clock must be plugged in to a power source. There is a backup battery, but this does not light up the display. A USB cable is provided, so plug this into a powered USB port or provide your own AC adapter. There are three brightness levels, quite adequate. Keep the clock on a level surface. The buttons for setting the time and brightness and 24H/12H selection are not easy to use, but I figured it out. I do not use the alarm, but keep an eye on the display to ensure you didn't accidentally enable the alarm. The AM/PM indicator is so small that it's not very useful, but since I don't use the alarm, it doesn't matter to me. I need a clock that is permanently lit for day and night use and readable from 15 feet, and this works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Is it a decent clock? Yes, but......
reviews.reviewText: Like others have said, it's about the size of a smartphone, but the numbers are big and clear so it's perfectly readable even from across a room. The lowest brightness setting is perfect for nighttime even in a bedroom: The numbers are bright enough to read at a glance in the middle of the night but not so much that they make the room less dark. I put mine on the opposite side of my small bedroom, but it seems like it wouldn't be annoying even right next to the bed.That said, it's definitely a lot more cheaply made than what I would expect of something that costs $20. It's VERY lightweight, which might be good I guess if you want to wall mount it, but it feels like a breeze could knock it over. It does look nice when you've set it down somewhere, but when holding it/pressing the buttons/etc. it feels more like something from the $10-$15 range.Another thing worth noting is that it has a USB cord, not an actual plug for an outlet. On one hand I guess this means anyone in the world can buy it without worrying about outlet compatibility, but on the other hand it might necessitate an additional purchase of an adapter depending on where you're planning to plug it in. It does have USB ports on it, so I assume the intention is that you just plug it into a phone charger and then plug your phone into the clock when you want to charge it, but depending on where you keep your phone vs. where you want to put the clock, this may not be a viable solution.The main reason I'm taking stars off is that there doesn't seem to be much in the way of quality control. The surface of my clock had no protective film on it and was badly smudged up - easily cleaned, but not what you would expect when buying a new item. There was no plastic strip protecting the battery contact either, so I'm just kind of blindly trusting that the battery compartment isn't corroded. (I should probably open it and check, but, y'know... lazy.) It also already had an alarm set, and thank goodness I noticed before the alarm went off because it ALSO didn't have any instructions in the box, so I had to go back to the Amazon listing and search the Q&A to figure out how to turn the alarm off. And I feel lucky that the only things missing from my item were the instructions and a couple bits of protective plastic - there are plenty of other reviews that mention missing stands and even missing power cords. It very strongly gives the impression that they're taking returned clocks and just shipping them right back out without even opening the box to check the contents, let alone making any effort whatsoever to restore them to a "new" state before selling them at a "new" price.Is it a decent clock? Yeah, absolutely. As long as the USB thing isn't an issue for you and you don't set it down in a place where anything might bump it (because again, it won't take much to knock it over), it'll serve your digital timekeeping needs well. Do I recommend buying it? Not really, no. It's luck of the draw whether you get a complete package, missing parts, or maybe even a damaged clock... You're probably better off shopping for a different brand.
Achei que as usb eram para tocar música, mas são apenas saídas. É só um despertador.

Highly recommend this clock as a cute and stylish decorative piece to any room.Although the reviews shed a poor light on this clock, I believe most the poor reviews were due to the user instead of the actual clock.I'm not a 'tech savvy" person but the set-up of this clock is super easy and if you read the instructions quiet clear on how to set it up properly.I'm not using it as an alarm clock, but it is very light weight and the stand isn't very sturdy so if you need to press a button regularly to turn it on and off this may be an issue.Other then that this is a trendy looking clock, that is easy to read, bright enough to see in any light and love the mirror background as a cool design touch!Love it!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Different product received, which is completely different
reviews.reviewText: Product in description and send product is not same. No name , charging port is different, no snooze button ,low build quality.After using long time , based on working, I will edit Star rating to 5 star.

Es ist super toll , also ich empfehle das uhr , das kann mann auch für wecker benutzen und für spiegel auch , es is perfekt für schlafzimmer oder Kinderzimmer ,weil diese uhr kann auch wie eine nachtlischt benutzen , einfach perfekt
Item came with the packaging super dented and the base of the clock was bent. Other than that, it works as advertised.
